channel.title: Failure on Tristan's website
channel.description: Recent content in Failure on Tristan's website

item.title: A non-exhaustive list of things I have failed to accomplish
item.description: A few years ago I stumbled across a blog post that described a person’s complete cv. The idea was that the cv listed both the things they had accomplished and the things they had failed to accomplish. At the time, it really helped me to see that to be successful you have to be willing to fail over and over.Â I use my website to show the things I have accomplished career-wise.
